Package TextEditor

Interface Engine

All Known Implementing Classes:
EngineImpl
public interface Engine
Main API for the text editing engine

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    copySelectedText()
    Copies the text within the interval specified by the selection control object into the clipboard.
    void
    cutSelectedText()
    Removes the text within the interval specified by the selection control object, from the buffer.
    void
    delete()
    Removes the contents of the selection in the buffer
    String
    getBufferContents()
    Provides the whole contents of the buffer, as a string
    String
    getClipboardContents()
    Provides the clipboard contents
    Memento
    getMemento()
    Gets memento of the current state of the engine.
    Selection
    getSelection()
    Provides access to the selection control object
    void
    insert​(String s)
    Inserts a string in the buffer, which replaces the contents of the selection
    void
    pasteClipboard()
    Replaces the text within the interval specified by the selection object with the contents of the clipboard.
    void
    selectionChange​(int beginIndex, int endIndex)
    Changes the selection indexes
    void
    setMemento​(Memento memento)
    Sets the state on the engine to be the state of the memento sent as a parameter.

  • Method Details

    • getSelection

      Selection getSelection()
      Provides access to the selection control object
      Returns:
      the selection object

    • getBufferContents

      String getBufferContents()
      Provides the whole contents of the buffer, as a string
      Returns:
      a copy of the buffer's contents

    • getClipboardContents

      String getClipboardContents()
      Provides the clipboard contents
      Returns:
      a copy of the clipboard's contents

    • cutSelectedText

      void cutSelectedText()
      Removes the text within the interval specified by the selection control object, from the buffer.

    • copySelectedText

      void copySelectedText()
      Copies the text within the interval specified by the selection control object into the clipboard.

    • pasteClipboard

      void pasteClipboard()
      Replaces the text within the interval specified by the selection object with the contents of the clipboard.

    • insert

      void insert​(String s)
      Inserts a string in the buffer, which replaces the contents of the selection
      Parameters:
      s - the text to insert

    • selectionChange

      void selectionChange​(int beginIndex, int endIndex)
      Changes the selection indexes
      Parameters:
      beginIndex - the first index of the selection
      endIndex - the last index of the selection

    • delete

      void delete()
      Removes the contents of the selection in the buffer

    • getMemento

      Memento getMemento()
      Gets memento of the current state of the engine.
      Returns:
      Memento- state of the engine.

    • setMemento

      void setMemento​(Memento memento)
      Sets the state on the engine to be the state of the memento sent as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      memento - - state of the engine that will be set.
